_header: Coming the great time of mercy
Note: Lacks the Prologue of 22 lines; for MSS containing the Prologue see 426.
_description: Robert of Brunne, Meditations on the Soper

BLHar218.First Lines:
Comyng the gret tyme of mercyWhan the fadyr sent his sone from an
                    hy…
BLHar218.Last Lines:
…To that pees perles we pray thou vs bringThat lyvest &
                    reiȝnest with out endyng

BLHar2338.First Lines: Comyng þe gret tyme of mercyWhan þe fadir sent his sone from an hyȝ…
BLHar2338.Last Lines: …[   ]it pes perles we pray þu vs bryng[   ] lyuys and regnys without endyng
BLHar2338.Note: Preceded by rubric Latin, “Cum esset plenitudo temporis misit deus filium suum factum” (f. 1br)
BLHar2338.Attributed Author: [   ]na Breus (added by later hand, f. 28, with date 1422)
BLHar2338.Attributed Title: [   ] passionis christi (added by later hand, f. 28, with date 1422)
